description: This file defines API routes for reviewing content in a web application using FastAPI, including listing, adding, updating, and deleting reviews. It contains route handlers, dependency injections, and database interactions related to reviews.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router instance for defining review endpoints.

methods.name: Profile _ensure_profile(profile_id: int, user: User, db: Session)
methods.description: Helper function to verify that a profile belongs to a user and exists.

methods.name: list_reviews_for_content(content_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API route to retrieve all reviews for a specific content item.

methods.name: add_review( profile_id: int, content_id: int, payload: ReviewCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: API route to create a new review for content by a specific profile.

methods.name: update_review( review_id: int, payload: ReviewUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: API route to update an existing review, ensuring the user owns the profile that created it.

methods.name: delete_review(review_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: API route to delete a review, ensuring the user owns the profile that created it.
